  • Constructor Details

    • MovieManager

      public MovieManager()
      Creates a new MovieManager.

  • Method Details

    • addNewMovie

      public void addNewMovie(Movie newMovie)
      Adds a new movie to the list of movies. Saves movie details to movie database. Displays a message that movie was successfully added.
      Parameters:
      newMovie - the new Movie to be added.

    • removeMovie

      public void removeMovie(int movieChoice)
      Removes a movie from the list of movies. Sets movie status to End of Showing. Displays a message that movie was successfully removed.
      Parameters:
      movieChoice - the movie option from the list of movies.

    • addNewMovieRating

      public void addNewMovieRating(float rating, String title)
      Adds rating to a selected choice of movie. Saves movie rating to movie database.
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating to be given to this movie.
      movieNum - the movie option from the list of movies.

    • addNewMovieReview

      public void addNewMovieReview(String review, String title)
      Adds review to a selected choice of movie. Saves movie review to movie database.
      Parameters:
      review - the review to be given to this movie.
      movieNum - the movie option from the list of movies.

    • getMovieList

      public ArrayList<Movie> getMovieList()
      Gets full movie list.
      Returns:
      the full movie list.

    • getSorted

      public ArrayList<Movie> getSorted()
      Sorts movies by ratings.
      Returns:
      the movie list sorted by ratings.

    • updateMovie

      public void updateMovie(int ID, Movie newMovie)
